body_html:
the files in contrib/gloo/ are bindings for gloo, not the actual gloo library itself.

Thx soumith @soumith ! Is there anyway to separately compile torch without introducing caffe2? As reported error in compiling process seems always being related to caffe2.
body_text:
the files in contrib/gloo/ are bindings for gloo, not the actual gloo library itself.

Thx soumith @soumith ! Is there anyway to separately compile torch without introducing caffe2? As reported error in compiling process seems always being related to caffe2.
body:
> the files in `contrib/gloo/` are bindings for gloo, not the actual gloo library itself.

Thx soumith @soumith ! Is there anyway to separately compile torch without introducing caffe2? As reported error in compiling process seems always being related to caffe2.
